rules_text:
When Ozulos enters the battlefield, choose one for each time a permanent named Ozulos has entered the battlefield under your control this game –
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Each opponent discards a card.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
When Ozulos dies, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.
